code: import{BookMarked}from'lucide-react';import{jsx as _jsx,jsxs as _jsxs}from"react/jsx-runtime";const CollectionsSpotlight=_ref=>{let{books=[]}=_ref;if(!books.length){return/*#__PURE__*/_jsx("div",{className:"rounded-3xl border border-slate-200 bg-white p-6 text-sm text-slate-500",children:"Add books to unlock curated collections."});}const genreCounts=books.reduce((acc,book)=>{if(!book.genre)return acc;acc[book.genre]=(acc[book.genre]||0)+1;return acc;},{});const topGenres=Object.entries(genreCounts).sort((a,b)=>b[1]-a[1]).slice(0,3);return/*#__PURE__*/_jsxs("div",{className:"rounded-3xl border border-slate-200 bg-white p-6 shadow-sm",children:[/*#__PURE__*/_jsxs("div",{className:"flex items-center gap-3 text-xs uppercase tracking-[0.3em] text-slate-400",children:[/*#__PURE__*/_jsx(BookMarked,{className:"h-4 w-4 text-indigo-500"}),"Curated shelves"]}),/*#__PURE__*/_jsx("ul",{className:"mt-4 space-y-3",children:topGenres.map(_ref2=>{let[genre,count]=_ref2;return/*#__PURE__*/_jsxs("li",{className:"flex items-center justify-between rounded-2xl border border-slate-100 bg-slate-50 px-4 py-3",children:[/*#__PURE__*/_jsxs("div",{children:[/*#__PURE__*/_jsx("p",{className:"text-sm font-semibold text-slate-900",children:genre}),/*#__PURE__*/_jsxs("p",{className:"text-xs text-slate-500",children:[count," titles available"]})]}),/*#__PURE__*/_jsx("button",{className:"text-xs font-semibold text-indigo-500",children:"View"})]},genre);})})]});};export default CollectionsSpotlight;
